name: Add Magnets
description:
This is a submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

The goal of the game is to combine and add more magnets so you can collect more coins. The theme was "stronger together" and I made it so when you have more magnets they are stronger and have more reach than if you would have only one.

Be aware that this is my first ever game and there might be some bugs. If you have things outside of your screen view, just press fullscreen and it might work.

I hope you like it :P
